register.name: IACKLPR0
register.description: Interrupt Acknowledge Level and Priority Register

register.name: IACKLPR1
register.description: Interrupt Acknowledge Level and Priority Register

register.name: RMON_T_DROP
register.description: Count of frames not counted correctly

register.name: RMON_T_CRC_ALIGN
register.description: RMON Tx packets with CRC/align error

register.name: RMON_T_UNDERSIZE
register.description: RMON Tx packets lower than 64 bytes, good CRC

register.name: RMON_T_OVERSIZE
register.description: RMON Tx packets greater than MAX_FL bytes, good CRC

register.name: RMON_T_FRAG
register.description: RMON Tx packets lower than 64 bytes, bad CRC

register.name: RMON_T_JAB
register.description: RMON Tx packets greater than MAX_FL bytes, bad CRC

register.name: IEEE_T_DROP
register.description: Count of transmitted frames not counted correctly

register.name: IEEE_T_MACERR
register.description: Frames transmitted with Tx FIFO underrun

register.name: IEEE_T_CSERR
register.description: Frames transmitted with carrier sense error

register.name: IEEE_T_OCTETS_OK
register.description: Octet count for frames transmitted without error

register.name: RMON_R_DROP
register.description: Count of received frames not counted correctly

register.name: RMON_R_CRC_ALIGN
register.description: RMON Rx packets with CRC/Align error

register.name: RMON_R_UNDERSIZE
register.description: RMON Rx packets lower than 64 bytes, good CRC

register.name: RMON_R_OVERSIZE
register.description: RMON Rx packets greater than MAX_FL bytes, good CRC

register.name: RMON_R_FRAG
register.description: RMON Rx packets lower than 64 bytes, bad CRC

register.name: RMON_R_JAB
register.description: RMON Rx packets greater than MAX_FL bytes, bad CRC

register.name: IEEE_R_DROP
register.description: Count of received frames not counted correctly

register.name: IEEE_R_OCTETS_OK
register.description: Octet count for frames received without error
